1. Documentation¶

Concept based on a conversation with my son Henry.

1.1. Bike Race¶

bikerace.minsec2hrs(s)[source]¶

string s e.g. “2.33” or “2:33”. convert to 2 minutes, 33 seconds = 2/60 + 33 / 3600 hours
